Doodle-a-day - day 1

Jul 27, 2015

So what's this doodle-a-day business about? Friends making each other think.

Hurray!!!  Oh I'm excited.  You can see my inspiration here:

Word of the day is 'Alarm' #PositivePostIts #Doodle #postit http://www.waynehanley.com/blog/2015/07/27/doodle-a-day-1/

So the beginning of anything is an awfully big adventure...  And the combination of that with Wayne's delightful image of waking up made me think of this:
